description: This dataset from the California Integrated Water Quality System (CIWQS) provides a list of enforcement action identification numbers and the identification numbers of the violation record that led to the enforcement action. A single violation record can be linked to multiple enforcement actions. An enforcement action can be linked to multiple violations. Additional information about violations and enforcement actions can be found within related datasets from CIWQS.
title: Wastewater Violations Linked to Enforcement Actions, 2005-2016
